name: BENDY FLEXY
description:
The Bendy Flexy skateboard is what we consider to be cruising longboard perfection. The Bendy Flexy deck combines absolutely killer looks with a slightly damped elastic flex that is as close to the feeling of surfing as you can get. The Bendy Flexy will have you stoked after every surf check no matter what the surf is doing.

SPECS
Wood: Northern Silk Oak & Hoop Pine (Cardwellia sublimis & Araucaria cunninghamii)
Size: 43” (1090mm) x 9 1/8" (230mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Bolts, nuts and riser pads provided
Flex: Please order flex 1 for riders 80kg or less and flex 2 for riders 80 to 120kg.

Complete: A complete comes fully assembled with Paris 180mm V1 trucks, Venom Cannibal 76mm 83a wheels, high quality bearings, risers pads and hardware.

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, also due to complexity in the production of the Bendy Flexy board please allow a lead time of up to10 days prior to shipping.

name: NAKED - Camphor
description:
This skateboard is crafted from a solid piece of carefully selected Camphor Laurel timber. This species is a weed throughout Australia but because of its kick ass grain we have decided to undertake some weed control and use as much as possible. This skate deck combines killer looks and great shred potential with a healthy serve environmental brownie points.

SPECS
Wood: Camphor Laurel (Cinnamomum camphora)
Size: 25.5” (650mm) x 6.5" (165mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete:A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5-7days prior to shipping.

name: LICKEDY SPLIT
description:
The Lickedy Split deck is hand crafted from strips of Australian Jarrah and Kauri Pine into the shape of a classic mini cruiser deck. These contrasting colours make for a very striking little skateboard that rides as good as it looks.

SPECS
Wood: Jarrah & Kauri Pine (Eucalyptus marginata & Agathis robusta)
Size: 27.5” (700mm) x 7.25" (185mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5 - 7days prior to shipping.

name: LITTLE STRIPPER
description:
The little stripper is crafted from strips of Rose Gum and Hoop Pine into the form of a classic styled mini cruiser board. This sleek little board is sure to turn heads as you carve your way through town.

SPECS
Wood: Rose Gum & Hoop Pine (Eucalyptus grandis & Araucaria Cunninghamii)
Size: 25.5” (650mm) x 6.5" (165mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5-7days prior to shipping.

name: NAKED - Jarrah
description:
This deck is crafted from a solid piece of sustainably grown Australian Jarrah and features a high gloss clear finish. This board combines killer looks and great rideability.

SPECS
Wood: Jarrah (Eucalyptus Marginata)
Size: 25.5” (650mm) x 6.5" (165mm)

name: STRIPEY
description:
The Stripey deck is crafted from differing width strips of carefully selected Rose Gum and Hoop Pine into the shape of a classic fish surfboard. You will find that this is a little cruiser board for any occasion, you can cruise mellowly around town, use the stiffness in the deck to carving through the crowd on the sidewalk or grab the rail to tear strips off some pavement.

SPECS
Wood: Rose Gum & Hoop Pine (Eucalyptus grandis & Araucaria cunninghamii)
Size: 27.5” (700mm) x 7.25" (185mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5 - 7days prior to shipping.

name: OFF CUTTER
description:
The Off Cutter is crafted by cutting all our off cuts up into strips and then laminating them together in a completely random selection giving you the most unique ride in town. The Off Cutter takes it's style from that of a classic fish surf board and that's how it rolls, mellow when you your cruising but with heaps of shed potential in store for when you want to step it up a gear.

SPECS
Wood: Randomly selected (Random ligna)
Size:27.5” (700mm) x 7.25" (185mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss Finish
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5-7 days prior to shipping.

name: DRIP STICK - Blue
description:
This surfboard inspired deck is shaped from a piece of select grade Hoop Pine and then dipped into paint. The result is a board that shows off its raw timber character with a little bit of flare.

SPECS
Wood: Hoop Pine (Araucaria Cunninghamii)
Size:27.5” (700mm) x 7.25" (185mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss Finish
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3" Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 6mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5-7days prior to shipping.

name: WEDGE TAIL
description:
The Wedge Tail is a true retro inspired skateboard, it is nice and wide up front, has a classic wedge style kick tail on the back and a relatively short wheel base. The Wedge Tail is bang on the magic numbers pool work and as a result it carves super hard, throw in the wedge tail to get you kick turning and you have a deck perfect for getting your stoke on wherever you ride it.

SPECS
Wood: Rose Gum & Hoop Pine (Eucalyptus grandis & Araucaria cunninghamii)
Size: 27.5” (700mm) x 7.25" (185mm)
Finish: Clear High Gloss
Bolt Pattern: Old School - Cast in Bolts and nuts provided

Complete: A complete deck includes; Vault Fibreflex 3” or 5” Trucks (90a bushes), 62 x 46mm 83a wheels , ABEC7 bearings and 10mm risers

Please note: Each D&F Board is unique and proudly hand crafted and finished, due to this please allow a lead time of 5-7 days prior to shipping.

name: CRUSHED GLASS GRIP
description:
Purchase this item along with your board if you would like us to apply our grip product to your board. Our grip is manufactured in house from smashed up glass bottles and we think it's the best grip product out there. As it is embeded in the clear finish it will outlast any other grip product, the course particles provide an exceptional level of grip that really locks your feet to the board.
Please note: We don't recomend riding gripped boards barefoot.
Grip is only available with the purchase of a board.
